name: Draconiano
description:
Deliver justice viscerally, in a frenetic 3d fps old school style where every bullet counts, slide, cover and shoot don't leave anyone alive, you're judge jury and executioner.

Play with Draco, an entity as ruthless as it is just, his way of seeing things, if you commit a serious crime, you must die, and this is the beginning of his path.

Everyone is guilty, do not hold back and use your powers and arsenal to comply with a draconian law of your own, being excessive at the very least, Run, jump and shoot, the levels are clastophovic, be with your enemies!.

Vapor of souls
You live to kill and killing restores your life, kill your enemies to heal.

High score
Get the maximum score, everything works, money, enemies, gold, collectibles.

Quick Resurrection
Death means nothing, you always come back.
